user.title: EV Charger Load Balancing
user.description: Configure the power meter and electrical service parameters. This integration currently supports one charger. Multi-charger support is planned for a future release.

data.unavailable_fallback_current: Fallback current (for 'Set a specific current' mode)

data_description.power_meter_entity: Sensor entity that reports total household power consumption in Watts.
data_description.voltage: Nominal supply voltage in Volts (used to convert W ↔ A).
data_description.max_service_current: Whole-house breaker rating in Amps. Charging will never exceed this limit.
data_description.unavailable_behavior: What to do when the power meter becomes unavailable: stop charging (safest), ignore and keep last value, or set a specific current (capped at the charger maximum).
data_description.unavailable_fallback_current: Charging current (A) to use when the meter is unavailable and mode is 'Set a specific current'. This value will be capped at the charger maximum.
data_description.action_set_current: Script entity called to set the charging current. Receives 'current_a' and 'charger_id' variables.
data_description.action_stop_charging: Script entity called to stop charging when headroom is insufficient. Receives a 'charger_id' variable.
data_description.action_start_charging: Script entity called to start/resume charging after it was stopped. Receives a 'charger_id' variable.

error.entity_not_found: The selected power meter entity was not found.

abort.already_configured: EV Charger Load Balancing is already configured.

init.title: Charger Action Scripts
init.description: Configure the scripts that control your EV charger. These can be added or changed at any time. Each script receives variables automatically — see the documentation for details.

data_description.action_set_current: Script entity called to set the charging current. Receives 'current_a' (float) and 'charger_id' (string) variables.
data_description.action_stop_charging: Script entity called to stop charging. Receives a 'charger_id' (string) variable.
data_description.action_start_charging: Script entity called to start/resume charging. Receives a 'charger_id' (string) variable.
